front.title: Packet Loss and Delay Measurement for the MPLS Transport Profile

abstract.t: An essential Operations, Administration and Maintenance requirementof the MPLS Transport Profile (MPLS-TP) is the ability to monitorperformance metrics for packet loss and one-way and two-way delay forMPLS-TP pseudowires, Label Switched Paths, and Sections. Thisdocument specifies protocol mechanisms to facilitate the efficientand accurate measurement of these performance metrics.
